example.eg: Harry phoned to say he was on his way, so I suppose he'll be here soon.
example.egtrans: 亨利打电话来说他正在路上，所以我想他很快就会到。

example.eg: Suppose Janet gets fired over your mistake; what will you do then?
example.egtrans: 假设珍妮特因你的过失而遭到解雇，你到时又打算怎么办？

example.eg: The government's policy of privatisation supposes that the private sector is better at running things than the public sector.
example.egtrans: 政府的私有化政策是假定在经营方面，私有部门比公有部门更为擅长。
